system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provides point of sale retail software to small businesses. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: Intermittent errors when retrieving product details via POS interface.

conversation_history.message: Our cashiers are reporting that sometimes they cannot retrieve product details during checkout. This happens randomly throughout the day.
Thank you for reporting this, Karen. Are there any specific error messages displayed when this happens?
Yes, it says 'Error fetching product details. Please try again later.' It doesn't happen all the time, but it's causing delays during busy hours.
Understood. We are currently investigating the issue. It seems related to API responses. Can you confirm if this happens on all registers or just specific ones?
All registers seem affected, but the issue is random. Sometimes it works fine, sometimes it doesn’t.
Thanks for the clarification. I’m escalating this to our backend team for further analysis. We’ll update you as soon as we have more information.
